name: Oppo Find X9 Pro
highlights:
Exp. release 2025, October
224g, 8.3mm thickness
Android 16, up to 5 major upgrades
256GB/512GB/1TB storage, no card slot

BODY.Build: Glass front (Gorilla Glass), glass back (Gorilla Glass), aluminum frame
BODY: IP68/IP69 dust tight and water resistant (high pressure water jets; immersible up to 1.5m for 30 min)

DISPLAY.Type: LTPO AMOLED, 1B colors, 120Hz, 2160Hz PWM, Dolby Vision, HDR10+, HDR Vivid, 800 nits (typ), 1800 nits (HBM), 3600 nits (peak)

PLATFORM.OS: Android 16, up to 5 major Android upgrades, ColorOS 16
PLATFORM.CPU: Octa-core (1x4.21 GHz C1-Ultra & 3x3.5 GHz C1-Premium & 4x2.7 GHz C1-Pro)

MAIN CAMERA.Triple:
50 MP, f/1.5, 23mm (wide), 1/1.28", 1.22µm, multi-directional PDAF, OIS
200 MP, f/2.1, 70mm (periscope telephoto), 1/1.56", 0.5µm, 3x optical zoom, multi-directional PDAF, OIS
50 MP, f/2.0, 15mm, 120˚ (ultrawide), 1/2.76", 0.64µm, multi-directional PDAF
MAIN CAMERA.Features: Laser AF, color spectrum sensor, Hasselblad Color Calibration, LED flash, HDR, panorama
MAIN CAMERA.Video: 4K@30/60/120fps, 1080p@30/60/240fps; gyro-EIS; HDR, 10‑bit video, Dolby Vision, LOG

COMMS.WLAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac/6/7, dual-band or tri-band, Wi-Fi Direct
COMMS.Positioning: GPS (L1+L5), BDS (B1I+B1c+B2a+B2b), GALILEO (E1+E5a+E5b), QZSS (L1+L5), GLONASS, NavIC (L5)

FEATURES.Sensors: Fingerprint (under display, ultrasonic), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass
FEATURES:
Satellite connectivity support (1TB 16GB RAM model only)
Circle to Search

BATTERY.Charging:
80W wired, 55W PD, 55W PPS, 80W UFCS
50W wireless
10W reverse wireless

MISC.Colors: Silk White, Titanium Charcoal, Velvet Red
